content:
Here's the previous conversation: 
Server: Thank you for calling [restaurant name], how may I assist you?
Guest: Yes, I would like to make a reservation for [number of people] at [time] on [date].
Server: Certainly, let me check our availability for that date and time. May I have your name, please?

Under the following scenario: Calling the restaurant to make a reservation while making a reservation, give me 3 different ways the guest might say to the server here.

Number those sentences and make sure each of them well suits the current situation.
